QuestData.Title: Chains of the Anub'ar
QuestData.Description: They have my father bound by magical chains in the middle of Icemist Village. From what I have been able to gather, the prison is controlled by three powerful Anub'ar magi - each holding a piece of the key.$B$BScour Icemist and locate the magi. Kill them and take their key fragments. With all three pieces we might be able to free my father. Once he is free...$B$BRetribution will come swiftly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Banthok Icemist at Icemist Village in the Dragonblight has asked that you bring him Anok'ra's Key Fragment, Tivax's Key Fragment and Sinok's Key Fragment.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, this will work.$B$B<Banthok expertly manipulates the key fragments.>$B$BHere it is, $c. With this key, my father will be freed of the Anub'ar prison.
